name: DRUUUNK!!!
description:
Oh no! _insert_name_here_ was just watching tv with her/his best friend/sister/cousin/mother/uncle, when suddenly Dr.Badguy apeared and kidnapped him/her!
Now it's up to you to save them, this is your time to shine!
But wtf is this?!? Every step you make outside of your house makes you more and more drunk!
Shit, you only have to stay on a straight line to get to Dr.Badguy, can't be that hard... Stay focused!!!

Photosensitive epilepsy warning:
If you can't handle flashing lights don't play this game!

Game is still in development / not finished.

Controls:
WASD or Arrows to move,
Space to jump,
or use a Gamepad


Support:

email me

ask me on twitter
